mapper.select: select re.* from t_users u left join t_users_roles tur on u.user_code=tur.user_code left join t_roles r on tur.role_code = r.role_code left join t_roles_authorities tra on r.role_code = tra.role_code left join t_authorities au on tra.authority_code = au.authority_code left join t_authorities_resources tar on au.authority_code = tar.authority_code left join t_resources re on tar.resource_code = re.resource_code where u.user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from t_resources r where r.parent=#{id}
